The user extends their arm outward at the target with an open palm. A massive purple ball of energy is then unleashed, followed by a immense demonic purple serpent. Its power is able to compete with the [[Parent and Child Rasengan]].

== Trivia ==
* This technique references the tale of [[Wikipedia:Urashima Tarō|Urashima Tarō]], Urashiki's namesake. In the story, Urashima rescues a turtle and is rewarded for his kindness with a trip to "[[wikipedia:Ryūgū-jō|Ryūgū-jō]]", the underwater Dragon Palace, home of the [[Wikipedia:Ryūjin|dragon kami]] of the sea.
